newsitem.title: POLAND: Consortium underwrites Drosed news issue.
newsitem.headline: Consortium underwrites Drosed news issue.

text.p: A consortium of bank BIG SA, BIG brokerage and France's Societe Generale agreed to look for investors and underwrote all the 300,000 shares of the new issue of the poultry firm Drosed SA , Drosed said.
It said in a statement the minimal guaranteed price was 45 zlotys. The issue price will be announced three days before subscription begins on October 21.
It said the consortium would get 1.7 percent of the value of the issue for looking for investors and 2.3 percent for underwriting the shares.
